author: missirol
body:
backport of #39377

#### PR description:

This PR adds supports for the logical operator `XOR` in the `triggerExpression::Parser` class used by HLT (used most notably in the `TriggerResultsFilter` plugin).

The XOR evaluator was actually implemented already (class: `OperatorXor`); it's just that the `Parser` was not aware of it.

Unit tests are updated accordingly.

Except for unit tests, this new functionality remains for now unused in any central workflow.

Merely technical. No changes expected.

#### PR validation:

Improved unit tests pass.

#### If this PR is a backport, please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported, please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

#39377

Development of HLT menus for 2022 data-taking.
title: support `XOR` operator in `triggerExpression::Parser` [`12_4_X`]
